query.text:
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Declare; &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Select;
if dbo.AI_ERP$Function$CheckSQLInjection(@stt_rec) = 0 return &GLTranReportSql; else begin declare @m_ma_nt0 varchar(10), @dv_tien nvarchar(16), @key nvarchar(128), @bilingual tinyint, @l char(1) declare @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128) declare @mau_in varchar(511), @q nvarchar(4000), @printCharge bit select @m_ma_nt0 = val from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' if @@form in ('011', '021', '031', '041', '051', '061', '211', '221', '231', '241', '170', '180') select @bilingual = 1, @l = 'V' else select @bilingual = 0, @l = @@language select @dv_tien = ra_2 from dmnt where ma_nt = @m_ma_nt0 select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC005' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC006' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC007' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC008' select @printCharge = 0
if @@form in ('064', '065') begin declare @ngay_ct0 smalldatetime, @dvcs0 varchar(33) select @ngay_ct0 = ngay_ct, @dvcs0 = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec exec rs_rptPrintCPTranExport @ngay_ct0, @ngay_ct0, @dvcs0, @stt_rec, '0', '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, @printCharge select 'rptPrintCPTRan_01_A5' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('090', '095') begin declare @ngay_ct1 smalldatetime, @dvcs1 varchar(33) select @ngay_ct1 = ngay_ct, @dvcs1 = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4 exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct1, @ngay_ct1, '56', @dvcs1, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge select 'rptPrintCDTran_02_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
-- Version 1 if exists(select 1 from kbsdmauin where controller = 'CPTran' and version = 'v1' and status = '1') begin if @@form in('030', '040', '130', '140', '031', '041', '231', '241') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @l) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc as so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') as ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) as nam, stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintCDTran2 @@language, @key, 'd56$$partition$current', 'r30$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
if @@form in('050', '060', '070', '080', '150', '160', '051', '061', '170', '180') begin declare @ngay_ct smalldatetime, @dvcs varchar(33) select @ngay_ct = ngay_ct, @dvcs = ma_dvcs from @@prime$partition$current where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4
if @@form in ('070', '080') begin exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '56', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '2', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge select 'rptPrintCDTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
if @@form in ('051', '061', '170', '180') begin exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '56', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '2', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge if @@form in ('051', '061') select 'rptPrintCDTran_01BI_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case @@form when '170' then 'CDTran_BIv1' else 'CDTranFC_BIv1' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
exec rs_rptPrintCDTranExport_v1 @ngay_ct, @ngay_ct, '56', @dvcs, @stt_rec, '1', '1', @@language, @@userID, @@admin, 1, @printCharge if @@form in ('050', '060') select'rptPrintCDTran_01_v1' as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; else select case @@form when '150' then '&Circular.TemplateFile.CDTran;' else '&Circular.TemplateFileFC.CDTran;' end as templateFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end
select a.ma_kh, case when exists(select 1 from options where name = 'c_009' and val = '1') then a.dien_giai else c.dien_giai end as dien_giai, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ty_gia, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, isnull(b.ten_nh, '') as tennh, isnull(b.ten_nh2, '') as tennh2, isnull(b.tknh, '') as tknh, isnull(b.tinh_thanh, '') as tinhthanh, a.ma_nt, N'1' as lien, &EBankingReportsSelect; e.ma_so_thue, d.dia_chi, b.chu_tk, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @l) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmtknh b with(nolock) on a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or b.ma_dvcs = '') left join dmnh e with(nolock) on b.ma_nh = e.ma_nh &EBankingReportsJoin; left join dmkh d with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = d.ma_kh where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
if @@form in ('071', '081') begin select @mau_in = case when @@form = '071' then case when in_nl_yn = '0' then d.mau_chuan else d.mau_nl end else case when in_nl_yn = '0' then d.mau_nt else d.mau_nl_nt end end from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) join dmtknh b with(nolock) on a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or b.ma_dvcs = '') join dmnh c on b.ma_nh = c.ma_nh join dmmauunc d with(nolock) on c.ma_mau = d.ma_mau and d.mau_in_yn = 1 where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @mau_in = isnull(@mau_in, '') if @mau_in <> '' begin select @mau_in as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end end &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
-- Previous version if @@form in('050', '060', '070', '080', '150', '160', '051', '061', '170', '180') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.t_tt as t_tien, a.t_tt_nt as t_tien_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @l) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc as so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) nam, stt_rec, @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia into #tmpMaster from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec
declare @strSQL nvarchar(4000) create table #tmpDetail (tk_no varchar(32), tien numeric(19, 2), tien_nt numeric(19, 2))
set @strSQL = 'insert into #tmpDetail select a.tk_no, sum(a.tien) as tien, sum(a.tien_nt) as tien_nt' set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' from (select 0 as l1, line_nbr, tk_no, tt - thue as tien, tt_nt - thue_nt as tien_nt from ' + dbo.ff30_DTable('d56$$partition$current') + ' a with(nolock) where stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'union all' set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'select 1, line_nbr, tk_thue_no, t_thue, t_thue_nt from r30$$partition$current a with(nolock) where stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + ''''
if @printCharge = 0 set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' and loai_ct > ''0''' else begin set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'union all' set @strSQL = @strSQL + char(13) + 'select 2, a.line_nbr, b.tk_cp, a.tien_cp, a.tien_cp_nt from f56$$partition$current a with(nolock) join dmcpnh b on a.ma_cp = b.ma_cp where a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' end
set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' ) a' set @strSQL = @strSQL + ' group by a.tk_no order by min(a.l1), min(a.line_nbr)' exec sp_executesql @strSQL
if @printCharge = 1 update #tmpMaster set t_tien = (select sum(tien) from #tmpDetail), t_tien_nt = (select sum(tien_nt) from #tmpDetail)
select * from #tmpMaster select * from #tmpDetail end else begin if @@form in('030', '040', '130', '140', '031', '041', '231', '241') begin select rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba,rtrim(b.ten_kh) as ten_kh ,rtrim(b.ten_kh2) as ten_kh2, a.dia_chi, a.dien_giai, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, a.ma_nt, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @l) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, a.so_ct_goc as so_ct_goc, a.dien_giai_ct_goc, a.ma_nk, a.so_ct, a.tk, a.ty_gia, replace(str(day(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, str(year(ngay_ct),4) nam, stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmkh b with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @key = 'a.stt_rec = ''' + @stt_rec + '''' exec rs_PrintCDTran2 @@language, @key, 'd56$$partition$current', 'r30$$partition$current', @@id, @bilingual &Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result; return end
select a.ma_kh, a.dien_giai, ltrim(a.so_ct) as so_ct, a.ty_gia, a.t_tt, a.t_tt_nt, isnull(b.ten_nh, '') as tennh, isnull(b.ten_nh2, '') as tennh2, isnull(b.tknh, '') as tknh, isnull(b.tinh_thanh, '') as tinhthanh, a.ma_nt, N'1' as lien, &EBankingReportsSelect; e.ma_so_thue, d.dia_chi, b.chu_tk, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, @l) as t_tt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, @l) as t_tt_nt_in_word, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(@m_ma_nt0, a.t_tt, 'E') as t_tt_in_word2, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$ReadCurrency(a.ma_nt, a.t_tt_nt, 'E') as t_tt_nt_in_word2, replace(str(day(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') ngay, replace(str(month(a.ngay_ct),2),' ','0') thang, cast(year(a.ngay_ct) as char(4)) nam, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$FormatStringValue(a.ty_gia) as chuoi_ty_gia from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) left join dmtknh b with(nolock) on a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or b.ma_dvcs = '') left join dmnh e with(nolock) on b.ma_nh = e.ma_nh &EBankingReportsJoin; left join dmkh d with(nolock) on a.ma_kh = d.ma_kh where a.stt_rec = @stt_rec
if @@form in ('071', '081') begin select @mau_in = case when @@form = '071' then case when in_nl_yn = '0' then d.mau_chuan else d.mau_nl end else case when in_nl_yn = '0' then d.mau_nt else d.mau_nl_nt end end from @@prime$partition$current a with(nolock) join dmtknh b with(nolock) on a.tk = b.tk and (a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs or b.ma_dvcs = '') join dmnh c on b.ma_nh = c.ma_nh join dmmauunc d with(nolock) on c.ma_mau = d.ma_mau where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @mau_in = isnull(@mau_in, '') if @mau_in <> '' begin select @mau_in as reportFile&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Value.Result; return end end end end
&Conditional.Unit.Profile.Query.Result;

header.v: Giấy báo nợ dạng tệp xlsx (Excel)
